title: Luxury Town houses and Single Homes
details:
With the increasing demand for quality accommodation in and around Colombo, ‘OPAL RESIDENCIES’ offering a modern luxury boutique development with only 19 houses in 01 Acre land. (Right next to CINEC Campus)

We have beautifully designed, 03 / 04 bedroom town houses (3,100 sq.ft.+) and Single Homes in 10 Perch land, built to highest quality, situated close to Malabe town, highway entrance (1km) at a convenient location with many public & private institutions.

All our Townhouses are built to the highest quality with German / European fittings and expert finishes handpicked to suit elegant and modern living.

Key Features:

Elegant living & dining
Fully fitted kitchen with high-quality appliances
Complete Bathrooms with European branded fittings
High Ceilings
Fully Air conditioned
Building structures using clay bricks
Fully landscaped back garden
02 parking spaces
24-hour security

We offer many in-house facilities for all our residents;

Club house
Swimming pool
Gymnasium
Sauna
Steam room
Billiards room
Salon
Coffee bar
